docs.title: Leeds BAG — Wiki / Home
docs.text:
Welcome — this site holds how-to guides, templates, and resources for the Leeds BAG research group.

Quick links - How to contribute: Contributing - Example guide: Example how-to

If you'd rather edit in the GitHub wiki, see the migration notes below.

docs.title: Migration notes
docs.text: • This branch copies content from the GitHub wiki (leeds-bag/bag_wiki.wiki) into docs/. Images have been moved into docs/images/ where possible and links updated. If you find any broken image or page links, please flag them in the PR.

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text:
Thank you for contributing! Use this short checklist:

  • Create or update a Markdown file in docs/
  • Use headings and short sections for readability
  • Add images to docs/images/ and reference with relative paths
  • Submit a branch and open a PR against main

Suggested PR title format: "docs: add/modify "

Template for a new how-to:

# Short title

## Why
Brief reason / context.

## Steps
1. Step one
2. Step two

## Notes
- Extra tips or links

docs.title: Example how-to
docs.text: This is an example how-to page. Replace with actual content.
